headline: Draw Pairs Gauff and Williams in First Round
abstract: The 15-year-old American, who beat Williams in the first round at Wimbledon last year, will face her again at the Australian Open.
lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia â€” In only her third Grand Slam event, Coco Gauff has challenges lined up that will already be familiar to her, as revealed in the Australian Open draw ceremony on Thursday evening.
